short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay focused and mindful while browsing with customizable timers, inspiring quotes, and gentle reminders to take breaks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mindfulness Timer: Distractions won't hold you back any longer.

Transform your browsing habits with Mindfulness Timer, a thoughtfully designed Chrome extension that helps you maintain focus and prevent digital overload.

Key Features:
- Flexible Timer Modes: Choose from Focus (25min), Short Break (5min), Long Break (15min), or Custom duration
- Minimal Interface: Collapses to a subtle circle when active, keeping you focused without distraction
- Inspirational Quotes: Receive wisdom and motivation at key moments
- Dark/Light Themes: Easy on your eyes, day or night
- Timer Sound Alerts: Gentle alerts when your set time is complete
- Achievement System: Track your mindfulness journey with unlockable achievements

Perfect for:
- Maintaining productivity during work sessions
- Preventing excessive social media use
- Taking regular screen breaks
- Building mindful browsing habits
- Practicing time-boxed focus sessions

Simple to use, yet powerful in helping you maintain a balanced digital lifestyle. Start your mindful browsing journey today!
